segments.text: I see an adult woman standing directly in front of the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing left, intently drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely fixed on that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the growing puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she shows absolutely no reaction to the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost baffling to witness her complete obliviousness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's risking slipping badly on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about her safety and the state of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wasted water is also a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just keeps polishing that plate, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn her about the unfolding disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
